burlap.behavior.singleagent.interfaces.rlglue.common

Class RLGlueSARSALambdaFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.behavior.singleagent.interfaces.rlglue.common.RLGLueQlearningFactory
      • burlap.behavior.singleagent.interfaces.rlglue.common.RLGlueSARSALambdaFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RLGlueLearningAgentFactory

    public class RLGlueSARSALambdaFactory
extends RLGLueQlearningFactory
    This class is used to setup a BURLAP SARSA-lambda algorithm with RLGlue. It can be launched from a main method and have various SARSA-lambda parameters specified by command line options. Use the "--help" option to see full list.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

        public LearningAgent generateAgentForRLDomain(Domain domain,
                                     double discount,
                                     RewardFunction rf,
                                     TerminalFunction tf)
        Description copied from interface: RLGlueLearningAgentFactory
        Returns a BURLAP learning agent for the given RLGlue generated domain, discount, reward function, and terminal function.
        Specified by:
        generateAgentForRLDomain in interface RLGlueLearningAgentFactory
        Overrides:
        generateAgentForRLDomain in class RLGLueQlearningFactory
        Parameters:
        domain - a BURALP domain that wraps the RLGlue environment and task
        discount - the RLGlue specified discount factor
        rf - the RLGlue specified reward function
        tf - the RLGlue specified terminal function
        Returns:
        a BURLAP learning agent
